Expand Lazy Table with Fallback Strategy

expand_lazy_table.Rd

Handles expansion of lazy tables with consistent fallback:

  1. Use user-supplied expansion table if provided

  2. Attempt to write temp table to database

  3. Throw expressive error if write fails

Usage

expand_lazy_table(
  tblInput,
  tblExpansion = NULL,
  dfExpansion_mem,
  strTempTableName,
  strExpansionType
)

Arguments

tblInput

tbl_lazy. The lazy table context (for extracting connection)

tblExpansion

tbl_lazy, data.frame, or NULL. User-supplied expansion

dfExpansion_mem

data.frame. In-memory expansion data for auto-generation

strTempTableName

character. Name for temp table

strExpansionType

character. Description for error messages

Value

tbl_lazy expansion table that can be joined
